content: NEW YORK  Feb 28 Meg Whitman  the head of technology firm Hewlett Packard Enterprise Co said that Donald Trump was "unfit" for the U.S. presidency on Sunday  NBC reported  and criticized New Jersey Governor Chris Christie  whose failed presidential bid she supported  for endorsing Trump.
name: Hewlett Packard Enterprise Company
title: CORRECTED-HP's CEO calls Trump "unfit" to be U.S. president

content: * Cooperates with Hewlett Packard Enterprise in the field of Digital Banking
name: Hewlett Packard Enterprise Company
title: BRIEF-CREALOGIX cooperates with Hewlett Packard Enterprise

content: Jan 7 Beauty products maker Avon Products Inc  said it would cut some global IT jobs after hiring Hewlett Packard Enterprise Co to run some of its technology operations.
name: Hewlett Packard Enterprise Company
title: Avon to reduce global IT headcount

content: * HP Inc sees 1st-qtr adj EPS $0.33-$0.38/shr vs est $0.42/shr
name: Hewlett Packard Enterprise Company
title: UPDATE 3-HP Inc profit forecast misses Street on weak PC  printer sales

content: Nov 24 Hewlett-Packard Co  the tech pioneer that split into two separate companies this month  reported a fall in revenue for the fifth straight quarter  hurt by lower PC sales and a slump in demand from businesses.
name: Hewlett Packard Enterprise Company
title: Hewlett-Packard revenue falls in last report before split
